#                                 |     |
#                                 \_V_//
#                                 \/=|=\/
#                                  [=v=]
#                                __\___/_____
#                               /..[  _____  ]
#                              /_  [ [  M /] ]
#                             /../.[ [ M /@] ]
#                            <-->[_[ [M /@/] ]
#                           /../ [.[ [ /@/ ] ]
#      _________________]\ /__/  [_[ [/@/ C] ]
#     <_________________>>0---]  [=\ \@/ C / /
#        ___      ___   ]/000o   /__\ \ C / /
#           \    /              /....\ \_/ /
#        ....\||/....           [___/=\___/
#       .    .  .    .          [...] [...]
#      .      ..      .         [___/ \___]
#      .    0 .. 0    .         <---> <--->
#   /\/\.    .  .    ./\/\      [..]   [..]
#
Simple block on one line:

<div>foo</div>

And nested without indentation:

<div>
<div>
<div>
foo
</div>
<div style=">"/>
</div>
<div>bar</div>
</div>

And with attributes:

<div>
	<div id="foo">
	</div>
</div>

This was broken in 1.0.2b7:

<div class="inlinepage">
<div class="toggleableend">
foo
</div>
</div>
